title: Who sings the song 'Eternal Flame'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song, Eternal Flame was performed by the group “The Bangles”, lead singer for this song is Susanna Hoffs. Cover versions were also performed by Atomic Kitten, Human Nature, MYMP, Emi Fujita, Roller Girl, Wayne Wonder, The Vienna Boy’s Choir, Amateur Transplants, Jessica Sanchez and Herman Brood.
The Bangels had a hit singing it in the 90s. Link is here to Eternal Flame by Bangles - Songfacts the story behind the song
